name: Roof Jumpet
description:
You should dodge spikes for limited time. Then spikes become faster and faster. 

live = True
while live:
--spikes.dodge()

Moving

  • Arrow left - move left
  • Arrow right - move right
  • Space - start game
  • Space + any arrow - super jump

Remember! If you lose all of your stamina you'll staying for some seconds!
